institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 21 (Project Team Performance Evaluation)
contents: Article 21 (Business Group Performance Evaluation) ① The Chairman shall conduct a performance evaluation of the business group in accordance with Article 18-2 of the Operation Regulations. ② The Chairman of the Board may entrust the performance evaluation pursuant to Paragraph 1 to an institution supporting training projects pursuant to Paragraph 1 of Article 25 of the Operational Regulations or an institution recommended by the Minister of Employment and Labor. ③ The Chairman of the Board may entrust the performance evaluation of the institution selected as a project group. If the evaluation result falls under any of the following items, measures such as limiting support for industry-led training projects, suspending support, or canceling selection may be taken through a review committee decision. 1. If the lowest grade has been received twice or more in a row as a result of the performance evaluation. 2. If the lowest grade has been received as a result of the performance evaluation more than three times within the past 5 years. ④ Institutions that have received notification of cancellation of selection based on the results of the performance evaluation will be notified from the date of notification. Applications for business group selection cannot be made within 3 years.
